list.item: 2024/01. “Alexander Wilfing: Walking in the Steps of Eduard Hanslick,” interview with Alexander Wilfing for the magazine sonograma, moderated by Mercedes de Luis Andrés

2023/09. “Der Kritiker als Komponist: Eduard Hanslicks Liedschaffen,” lecture recital organized by Alexander Wilfing and Anja Bunzel (Institute of Art History, Czech Academy of Sciences) at the Austrian Centre for Digital Humanities and Cultural Heritage, Austrian Academy of Sciences.

2023/04. “Geschichte, Gegenwart und Zukunft der Musikwissenschaft(en),” workshop at the Austrian Centre for Digital Humanities and Cultural Heritage, Austrian Academy of Sciences, funded by the Austrian Science Fund FWF.

2020/04. “New Directions in Hanslick Scholarship,” workshop at the Department of Musicology, University of Vienna, funded by the Austrian Science Fund FWF and the Austrian Academy of Sciences (cancelled due to COVID-19 pandemic).

2019/07. Organisation of the special session “Hanslick’s Concepts: Meaning, Translation, Reception,” 7th Biennial Music and Philosophy Conference, London; organisation: Alexander Wilfing; presenters: Christoph Landerer, Lee Rothfarb, and Alexander Wilfing; for further details and the program, see https://musicandphilosophy.ac.uk/events/mpsg-2019/.

2017/03. “Probleme der Hanslick-Forschung,” workshop at the Institute of History of Art and Musicology, Austrian Academy of Sciences, funded by the Austrian Academy of Sciences and the City of Vienna.

2016/12. “Der böse Besserwisser: Eduard Hanslick,” interview with Christoph Landerer, Lee Rothfarb, and Alexander Wilfing for the radio program “Apropos Musik” (Ö1), conducted by Johannes Leopold Mayer

2016/09. “Hanslick im Kontext / Hanslick in Context,” bilingual international conference, Austrian Society for Music, funded by the Austrian Science Fund FWF, the Austrian Academy of Sciences, and the City of Vienna; for further details and the program, see http://hanslick2016.com/ and https://www.oeaw.ac.at/acdh/musicology/detail/eduard-hanslick-im-kontext-3.
